fr.ensimag.equipe3.controller

Interface ValidableForm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NewVehicleController, SignupController

    public interface ValidableForm
    This interface gives the possibility to validate different fields in a form.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HashMap<Control,Pair<Boolean,String>> _conditions
      This is the data structure that associates :
      - a field
      - a condition
      - a message to show if the condition is false
      static ArrayList<ContextMenu> _hints
      This is the array that contains all the contextual menus displayed

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addCondition(Control control, Boolean condition, String message)
      Adds a condition to be checked.
      static void clearConditions()
      Removes all the conditions.
      boolean createConditions()
      This is the method that has to be implemented in order to specify the validation conditions.
      static void hideAllHints()
      This function hides all contextual menus.
      static void invalidateField(Control node, String message)
      Creates a new contextual menu and displays it near the invalid field with the given message.
      static boolean validateFields()
      This function is called when we want to check all the conditions.

    • Field Detail

      • _hints

        static final ArrayList<ContextMenu> _hints
        This is the array that contains all the contextual menus displayed

      • _conditions

        static final HashMap<Control,Pair<Boolean,String>> _conditions
        This is the data structure that associates :
        - a field
        - a condition
        - a message to show if the condition is false

    • Method Detail

      • createConditions

        boolean createConditions()
        This is the method that has to be implemented in order to specify the validation conditions.
        Returns:
        True if all conditions are valid, false otherwise.

      • addCondition

        static void addCondition(Control control,
                         Boolean condition,
                         String message)
        Adds a condition to be checked.
        Parameters:
        control - The field we are working on.
        condition - The condition needed to be satisfied.
        message - The message we display if the condition is false.

      • clearConditions

        static void clearConditions()
        Removes all the conditions. This function needs to be called when validating multiple forms: if not, there might be conditions from old forms in the current forms.

      • validateFields

        static boolean validateFields()
        This function is called when we want to check all the conditions.
        Returns:
        True if all the conditions are true, false otherwise.

      • hideAllHints

        static void hideAllHints()
        This function hides all contextual menus. As the method #createConditions is called each time, we simply clear the contextual menus array.

      • invalidateField

        static void invalidateField(Control node,
                            String message)
        Creates a new contextual menu and displays it near the invalid field with the given message.
        Parameters:
        node - The field to modify.
        message - The message to display in the contextual menu.
